title: Darwin and Freud challenge Enlightenment thought

content.question:
Directions: The suggested writing time for this question is 30 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your essay. In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. If time permits when you finish writing, check your work.

Evaluate how the ideas of Charles Darwin and Sigmund Freud challenged Enlightenment assumptions about human behavior and the role of reason.

topic.text: 4.1: Contextualizing the Scientific Revolution and Enlightenment

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
